title: The spread of Mini-Publics across the World
description: As a part of the project “Doing mini-publics: Translocalization of politics” we counted all mini-publics worldwide. The umbrella term mini-publics describes a series of procedures that directly involves citizens and promotes democratic deliberation. Since the 1970s, different models have spread around the world, initially independently of one another. Click on the individual points to get more information.
